amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part C of House Report 119-399 to require the Secretary to report on any vulnerabilities due to the employment of noncitizens at facilities in the U.S. that generate or transmit electricity.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
